In England, in the seven days to 03 June, there were 36,418 new confirmed cases (64.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 May, there were 35,564 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (854 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 June is 18,811,661 (33,265.5 cases per 100,000 population).
